## ConversationReferenceStore interface

A store to persist notification target references.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ConversationReferenceStore 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [add(key, reference, options)](./teamsfx.conversationreferencestore.add.md) | Add a conversation reference to the store. If overwrite, update existing one, otherwise add when not exist. |
|  [list(pageSize, continuationToken)](./teamsfx.conversationreferencestore.list.md) | List stored conversation reference by page. |
|  [remove(key, reference)](./teamsfx.conversationreferencestore.remove.md) | Remove a conversation reference from the store. |
